com.google.code.ckJsfEditor
Class BasicStyle

java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.ckJsfEditor.BasicStyle
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicStyleOverride
public class BasicStyle
extends java.lang.Object

Used by the Config object, BasicStyle represents a css rule set to be used by the editor.

The BasicStyle object represents a css rule set like this:

BasicStyle style = new BasicStyle("span", "color", "#aed0ea");

represents:

span {
    color: "#aed0ea";
}

Author:
Bill Reh

BasicStyle

public BasicStyle(java.lang.String element,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> rules)
Creates a BasicStyle object representing a css rule set with multiple rules.

Parameters:
element - The element to apply the rules to.
rules - The rules to apply stored in a Map as styleProperty/value pairs.
